oppress.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to treat a group of people unfairly or cruelly, and prevent them from having the same rights that other people in society have
oppress.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: native tribes oppressed by the authorities
oppress.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make someone feel unhappy, worried, or uncomfortable
oppress.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The gloom in the chapel oppressed her.
oppress.translation[0].note_box[0].items: Oppress is often used in the passive
